SELECT /* GetMarketingPermissions.onl.RetrieveCustomerPermissions */ PD.PERMISSION_ID, PD.SERVICE_ID, PD.EFFECTIVE_DATE, PD.PERMISSION_VALUE, PD.BEW_VERSION FROM PERMISSION_PREFERENCE_DETAIL PD
PD.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = #customerNumber# AND PD.EFFECTIVE_DATE = #date# AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PERM_DEF PDEF WHERE PDEF.GET_ROLE_LIST LIKE #role# AND PD.PERMISSION_ID = PDEF.PRM_ID AND PD.SERVICE_ID =PDEF.SRV_ID AND (PDEF.EXPIRATION_DATE is null or PDEF.EXPIRATION_DATE > SYSDATE))
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PERM_DEF PDEF WHERE PDEF.FRONTEND_GRP = #frontendGroup# AND PD.PERMISSION_ID = PDEF.PRM_ID AND PD.SERVICE_ID =PDEF.SRV_ID AND (PDEF.EXPIRATION_DATE is null or PDEF.EXPIRATION_DATE > SYSDATE))
ORDER BY PERMISSION_ID,SERVICE_ID

SELECT /* GetMarketingPermissions.onl.RetrieveDefaultPermissions */ PDEF.PRM_ID AS PERMISSION_ID, PDEF.SRV_ID AS SERVICE_ID, PDEF.EFFECTIVE_DATE, PDEF.DEFAULT_VALUE AS PERMISSION_VALUE from perm_def PDEF
NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PERMISSION_PREFERENCE_DETAIL PD1 WHERE PD1.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = #customerNumber# AND PDEF.PRM_ID=PD1.PERMISSION_ID AND PDEF.SRV_ID=PD1.SERVICE_ID AND PD1.EFFECTIVE_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DATE) FROM PERMISSION_PREFERENCE_DETAIL PD2 WHERE PD2.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = PD1.CUSTOMER_NUMBER AND PD2.PERMISSION_ID=PD1.PERMISSION_ID AND PD2.SERVICE_ID=PD1.SERVICE_ID AND PD2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= SYSDATE )) AND PDEF.GET_ROLE_LIST LIKE #role# AND (PDEF.EXPIRATION_DATE is null or PDEF.EXPIRATION_DATE > SYSDATE) AND PDEF.BEW_VERSION_NR = 0 AND PDEF.PRM_ID != 'BEW' AND PDEF.SRV_ID != 'NONE'
AND PDEF.FRONTEND_GRP = #frontendGroup#
ORDER BY PERMISSION_ID,SERVICE_ID

SELECT /* GetMarketingPermissions.onl.RetrieveCustLegacyPermissions */ C.MARKETING_FAX_INDICATOR,C.MARKETING_PHONE_INDICATOR,C.PERSONAL_DATA_INDICATOR,C.CUSTOMER_DATA_INDICATOR, C.MARKETING_AUTHORIZATION_DATE, C.EFFECTIVE_DATE FROM CUSTOMER C WHERE C.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = #value# AND C.EFFECTIVE_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(EFFECTIVE_DATE) FROM CUSTOMER C1 WHERE C.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = C1.CUSTOMER_NUMBER AND C1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= SYSDATE ) AND C.EFFECTIVE_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT /* GetMarketingPermissions.onl.RetrievePermissionStatus */ P.EFFECTIVE_DATE, P.SOURCE_SYSTEM, P.BEW_VERSION FROM PERMISSION_PREFERENCE P WHERE P.CUSTOMER_NUMBER = #value# ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC
